text: Led Yahoo Search FE with Microsoft Bing Search integration (2019, 2020, 2022). Experienced in A/B testing and a solid understanding of metrics analysis; Strong understanding of ADs monetization and UX interaction in the FE engineering domain.

Experienced and involved in building million PVs/day level products; Good at working with Product, Business Development, Design, QA, Sale planner, and Cross-functional engineering teams in different time zone.
Proficient in JavaScript and focus on mobile web development; Strong domain knowledge in CI/CD release process.
Over 40+ times as the FE engineering FTE/intern interviewer, experienced in mentoring engineers and interns.

High profiles of hackathon winner in the world-class competition (Second place of Yahoo Open Hack Day 2012 and 2013, The Most Potential Award of Yahoo Open Hack Day 2012; Second place of Mozilla Firefox OS App Day 2013); Creative hackathon player in the team in tier-1 company record (Facebook, Line, Booking.com, and Baidu).
